name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details having not logged in

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API
And I have not located a customer

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000125000 |
Then I should receive an Authorisation Error
